attributes.action: Make it Law that all Food selling premises have scores on the door on display
attributes.background: Every food premises regardless of which part of the U.K. Should display there scores on the door!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition which outlines which specific score - for example, hygiene score - you would like food selling premises to display.
